name: Login with extremely long username
description: Verify the behavior when attempting to log in with an extremely long username.
steps: Step 1: Enter a username exceeding 255 characters into the 'Username or email address' field.
Step 2: Enter a valid password into the 'Password' field.
expected_results: Expected result 1: The login attempt should fail.
Expected result 2: An error message might be displayed, or the input field might be truncated.

elements.description: Username or email address input field
